author: cnbc.com
title: Aqua Metals reports 4Q loss
text:
ALAMEDA, Calif. (AP) _ Aqua Metals Inc. (AQMS) on Thursday reported a loss of $7 million in its fourth quarter.
On a per-share basis, the Alameda, California-based company said it had a loss of 32 cents.
The lead recycler posted revenue of $896,000 in the period.
For the year, the company reported that its loss widened to $26.6 million, or $1.31 per share. Revenue was reported as $2.1 million.
For the current quarter ending in April, Aqua Metals said it expects revenue in the range of $1.3 million to $1.4 million.
In the final minutes of trading on Thursday, the company's shares hit $2.60. A year ago, they were trading at $20.21.
This story was generated by Automated Insights ( http://automatedinsights.com/ap ) using data from Zacks Investment Research. Access a Zacks stock report on AQMS at https://www.zacks.com/ap/AQMS
